text.p: Tandem Computers Inc and Informix Software Inc said Monday they had formed a strategic partnership to integrate the Informix DataBlade application programmer interface with Tandem's ServerWare SQL database software on Tandem's Himalaya and Windows NTR cluster-aware servers.

Under the agreement, Tandem will license source code for the Informix Illustra and the Informix-Universal Server databases and will integrate Informix's DataBlade into Tandem's NonStop SQL database engine, the industry's first parallel implementation of standard query language (SQL).

The resulting product, ServerWare SQL, will run on systems that support Tandem's new ServerNet interconnect technology -- which provides virtually unlimited bandwidth and the ability to cluster parallel processing systems for high-performance and continuous availability. These systems include Tandem's next-generation of Himalaya parallel servers and forthcoming Windows NT Server-based systems. In addition, ServerWare SQL will be marketed to run on any Windows NT Server platform.
